channel.title: Help with procedure in script that I dont get
channel.description:
I keep getting this error:
[code]Failed when compiling Line 80: [Error] (14761:1): Semicolon (';') expected in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.12\Scripts\AutoTalker V.5.scar[/code]
With my: [code] procedure Declareplayers;[/code]
I dont know why it gives me this but all I know is that I can't find anything wrong.
If you need it I will give the entire script.(Although I hate revealing new scripts)

item.title: Help with procedure in script that I dont get
item.dc:creator: @jvwarrior jvwarrior
item.description:
@jvwarrior wrote:

ok i got it to compile thanx

Read full topic

item.title: Help with procedure in script that I dont get
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

Look above that procedure,
You’ve most likely forgotten a semicolon after a variable or const declaration

Read full topic
